website_summaries.verdict: Best way to get 13 nutrients into a mac-and-cheese-loving kid's diet.
pros: Earns top marks for not tasting fishy despite presence of omega-3 fish oil
Safe for kids with most allergies – gluten, casein, and nut-free
No synthetic colors, sweeteners, flavors or preservatives
cons: Not the best choice for vegans or those who keep kosher

customer_reviews.title: Comparison of smartypants, olly, and zarbee kids vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 7 yr old girl because It includes omega 3 fish oil and fiber. However you need take 4 gummies per day and the gummy is a little hard. My 4 yr old doesn’t like it much. Sugar level is 2 gram per 4 gummies is positive. My 4 yes old takes olly kids multi-probiotic 2 gummies/day. It doesn’t have fiber or omega 3, however, the probiotic really help her bowel movement! I have 2 yr old taking zarbees simply because it has 3 mg iron per gummy. His iron level is low. Other two vitamin don’t have iron unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: GWOODSONG

customer_reviews.title: All our problems disappeared!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old has had chronic constipation problems due to too much dairy. We tried everything and finally, I decided to try getting her on a regular fiber inclusive vitamin. After two weeks and no dietary changes, my daughter now poops daily and has absolutely no problem with holding it in or having it be tough. I know, TMI... but as a worried Mom- I was willing to try everything, and this was the only solution that actually worked. I can't recommend these vitamins highly enough... they are wonderful and my kid loves them too, so I guess it's a win win!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline U

customer_reviews.title: After working up to the recommended dose his nervous system/hyperactivity were on hyper drive
customer_reviews.text: My son has the MTHFR gene, so we needed something with Folate. However, I think the other products in it trigger his ADHD/SPD. After working up to the recommended dose his nervous system/hyperactivity were on hyper drive. He was erratic and more impulsive than usual. Once I stopped giving them to him, he was fine. I then started giving half the dose along with a magnesium supplement. That worked okay, but he is much better off not taking these at all. I give it 3 starts because it didn't work for us and some of the ingredients could use some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: KRout

customer_reviews.title: Hard chunks in several of the gummies
customer_reviews.text: We went through our first bottle of these vitamins and my 4 year old seemed to really like them. Our second bottle she kept on spitting them out, when I asked her what was going on she said they had “seeds” in them. Now she refuses to take them all together. I started trying them to figure out what was going on and maybe 1 in 3 has a very hard crystal or chunk in it. It is painful to your teeth when you bite down expecting a soft gummie. Perhaps a quality control issue since it wasn’t an issue with our first bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Know what the label means
customer_reviews.text: This product uses synthetic vitamins. Those are Made from petrochemicals. NOT real vitamins from food. THOSE petrochemicals could be poisoning your children and could be carcinogens. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Warren

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive behavior
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these and even tried a couple different types. With all the great reviews I thought this was a given but every time I give my daughter these she becomes very mean. I am not sure what it is (and would love to drill down more if I could) but there is definitely something in these that makes her lose her mind. At first I thought I was off my rocker but then after reading a few of some other 1 star reviews I see I am not alone. I do think they are a great brand but for some reason not for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L.

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins but sticky
customer_reviews.text: My child's pediatrician recommended them and they seem very good except for they were kind of sticky since day one and got worse within time. I have a friend who has had the same issue when ordering online. Bummer. We both stopped ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Chin

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of plastic inside vitamin pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very upset momma here. These were great vitamins. Helped with my kids constipation issues. Then my daughter came to me crying. She had something hard stuck between her teeth from her vitamin. I got it out and its a hard piece of plastic!! Both those pieces were found in one vitamin!! I asked her if this has happened before, and she said almost every time!!! I dont know if its just this lot or if its all of them. All I know is I'm furious. Ill be calling the company after the holiday weekend. I just wanted to put this out there for anyone that may get this lot.
customer_reviews.author: HESS_NC

customer_reviews.title: I will give this 5 stars because I think they taste good. My son however hates them
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I will give this 5 stars because I think they taste good. My son however hates them. I don't want to lie because I, like many others buy things based on customer reviews. Upon receiving them, I had my son try them. He said they were gross. So I tried them and I think they taste great. Slightly more dense then some of the other ones at say Target, but more flavorful. They are not HARD like some nasty ones off the shelf at stores and they are a little tart. I will use them and buy my son other ones. However, 5 stars still and you should still try them. My kid is just really picky I think.
customer_reviews.author: TheHBIC

customer_reviews.title: Bad reaction and mood change
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vitamin for my child. Since she started taking this vitamin her mood change, she was so nervous, irritated, very angry, defiant. I never saw my child like that bad. Terrible!!! I did not know what was going on and I did not link her mood change with this vitamin. But then after trying to figure it out, it came to my mind that it could be this product. I stopped giving her a week a ago and she is normal again. For me I just want to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious; help toddler stay regular
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. My 2-year old takes one each day. We had trouble with potty training for BMs at first until a friend recommended a fiber gummy, and these have been a life saver. Our daughter is much more regular and I love that it's a multi-vitamin too. And they're seriously so tasty (almost like fruit Gushers). I'm tempted to take them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Laura N

customer_reviews.title: If your child is anything like mine, then getting them to eat nutritiousness food ...
customer_reviews.text: If your child is anything like mine, then getting them to eat nutritiousness food is like asking them to violate their inner core beliefs to all that is life. While these are not a complete replacement for that problem, they provide some good needed nutrition and my son loves the way they taste. So while we will continue our daily war of eating good food, these make us feel a little better as parents. We like these ones better than than the slightly cheaper version of these with sugar coating on them.
customer_reviews.author: Commet32

customer_reviews.title: The best vitamin we've used!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! I was using Flintstones gummies for my kids (3 and 5 now) for a few years. I also supplemented with a probiotic and Miralax...but the Miralax made my 5 year old crampy and VERY bloated. Since switching to these vitamins and(1-2 gummies a day for the fiber gummies per kid), we are completely off Miralax! It's also saving me money. I'm so glad I changed things up. My kids are much more comfortable, regular, and I know I'm putting good stuff in their body without dyes or weird additives.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: Strange behavior
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old didn’t like these very much. Too chewy/hard and she said they were crunchy. I came back to see what other folks said about behavior. After a few days of taking these vitamins my daughters behavior and temperament was like Id never witnessed. She was angry, throwing tantrums from the moment she opened her eyes in the morning and was awful to be around through out the day. I stopped giving them to her and she seems much more even and calm. Not sure what the deal was. Not something I’d use again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy grandchildren!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren, ages 3 andc4, were constantly getting colds. It was bad! It was one cold after another after another. Since starting Smartpants vitamins 8 months ago they have not gotten sick ... not even a sniffle. I'm happy and I know they are! My granddaughter is very picky. She doesn't like gummy fruit snacks but she gladly takes her vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good product, until our most recent shipment
customer_reviews.text: Based on the ingredient list, these seem like a good option. A little more expensive that some of the others, but worth it if the quality is there. Unfortunately, our most recent delivery of this product came in a pretty poor state. When I opened the bottle, the vitamins were all gooey and stuck together. I'm using a fork to get them out because they're all sticky and won't fall out on their own. We'll probably try one more order of these and if they're in the same condition, we'll discontinue our monthly shipment.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: Quality, affordable, delicious
customer_reviews.text: My boys like these gummies and I can feel good about the ingredients in them. The recommended serving is 3-4 gummies (the size of small spice drops). Which I found gets to be a bit much for my boys (2 &5) but also understand due to needing to get all the nutrients in while still being a size kids can handle. They are super sticky and get in the teeth which my boys weren’t fans of. Overall this is a great product, good quality and tastes delicious. My boys like them other than the quantity and getting sticky teeth. Would definitely recommend if you’re looking for a quality affordable kid vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: love the line of products but didnt like this one.
customer_reviews.text: too firm to be a chewy gummy and needed more fruit flavors in it
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My child tried several other vitamins that were just too big, chalky, tasted horrible, etc., but these were the first natural (no dyes or artificial colors) vitamins that he would take without being fussy. I should mention he has severe sensory issues, so often times the smell of the vitamins is enough to make taking them a real challenge, but not with these. These have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Leleux Calcote

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews of what felt like every kid vitamin. My kid likes them. My hubby likes them. We only feed her two per day (she’s twelve) because she doesn’t have a low fiber diet and... that can get embarrassing... but no issues with the flavor or texture. She was eating the Flinstone chewable before we bought this and she really prefers these.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good when not sent expired ones...
customer_reviews.text: I like that these have L-methylfolate because I think that is the more absorbable kind of Folate. This most recent bottle I received in my Subscribe & Save order is 1 year expired!!! The seal was even bloated but I opened it anyway and the gummies smelled ok but then I fortunately checked the expiration date and it reads "EXP 21JAN2019". I hope other parents checked their bottles!!
customer_reviews.author: freedommm

customer_reviews.title: Great source of vitamins for kids.
customer_reviews.text: April 14th 2020... Just a update to my first review. I dunno if this is happening to anyone but lately when we open the bottle for the first time we always notice the gummys are melted together. Making it almost impossible to get them out of the bottle. Could quality control or quality assurance please take a look at this issue please? I'm sorry but I'm gonna have to take off a couple stars because of this or just look for another brand. ____________________________________ I love that my toddler enjoys them very much. Wakes up every morning asking for them. He thinks they're snacks lol
customer_reviews.author: Mr. White

customer_reviews.title: Check bottles immediately!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only vitamins we use for our kids. I ordered a couple of bottles so I wouldn't have to buy more for awhile. Unfortunately I didnt check each bottle for seals immediately. I went to get the last bottle, opened it, and found that there was no seal under the lid! And unfortunately I'm too late for the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Meh, too chewy and not a great taste
customer_reviews.text: My son didn't like these. They taste like vitamins and are SO CHEWY! They are the exact consistency you want your child to avoid to prevent cavities. We're switching back to Whole Foods Brand of 365 children's vitamins. I really wanted him to like these, as I love the ingredients list. If you're child isn't a picky eater, then you'd probably be ok. But I'd still have them go brush their teeth right after, because the chewy consistency will hang on their teeth all day.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Helped 5 year old's constipation
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these. There's more sugar than I would like but hey, she eats them. I have to take what I can get. I started my daughter on these after she was feeling constipated and I figured she needed some fiber. It has helped with that but wasn't a total solution. Not we give her 4 of these and 1 cup of apple juice each day and it seems to have fixed the problem. I have an MTHFR gene mutation so I like that these have methylated folate just in case she has it too.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh G.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and effective
customer_reviews.text: My son has an aversion to a lot of textures, so getting him to eat a wholesome diet is extremely challenging. Even finding vitamins that he'll take willingly is a struggle. Smarty Pants is one brand he will take consistently and getting the added fiber into my sons diet is a blessing. I took away one star because these vitamins are extremely sticky. They stick to one another and to the bottle, so getting them out requires a bit of effort. Despite that, we'll still continue to purchase them because their quality and effectiveness outweighs this minor downside.
customer_reviews.author: Iz

customer_reviews.title: Smarty Pants
customer_reviews.text: this product helps my AD/HD grandson focus better we give it to him every day!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: I bought this vitamin because my 4 y/o son suffers ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vitamin because my 4 y/o son suffers from constant soft, diarrhea-like stools. I realize most of the time, parents adding fiber might be trying to help the opposite problem but this product is the only one I found that specifically states the use of soluble fiber, which helps both poop situations. I'll tell you what, my son experienced the benefits of this vitamin after a day of use! I'll never put him on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Give a try before pharmaceutical remedies for hyper children.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my child who was having some behavorial problems. ADHD runs on his father's side if the family and we were having some major problems in school. I don't want to medicate my child if I don't have to, so I ordered these. I have seen huge difference in him. It could also be due to the fact he is getting older, but a big difference since about 2 weeks after taking 4 gummies a day. I have them on auto order.
customer_reviews.author: fekind

customer_reviews.title: They say 4 and up due to extreme chewiness/stickiness
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3-year-old gags easily and she can't take these. The ones made for younger kids have sugar and my sister gives these to her little girl the same age but every kid is different. I even cut them up but still too chewy for my little one. I guess I will just eat them ***4 out of 5 stars because the taste is meh and the chewiness is a bit much even for me however they are cane sugar free so I have to say I get a sugar free vitamin can only taste as good as it can
customer_reviews.author: Evian143

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamins and they aren't covered in sugar!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are great and not covered in sugar- which was very important to me! My kiddo likes the taste and there's no argument over needing to take vitamins. Highly recommended and the best value per ounce that I've found has been through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: McJ

customer_reviews.title: "good but not great" says the kid eating them
customer_reviews.text: the kid won't eat these.... but it's probably because I've been giving her Olly brand and it has sugar on the outside... I ordered the biggest bottle so now i'm stuck with 120 of these that won't get eaten. bummer. nothing against this product, the taste tester just won't eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Cakes

customer_reviews.title: These are great vitamins except for the strawberry-banana flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are great vitamins except for the strawberry-banana flavor. I have to sort that one out, otherwise getting my discerning 4 year old to eat them is next to impossible. The D vitamins and fiber in there are great, so she doesn't have to take half a dozen different vitamins every day. I just wish we could get just the citrus (lemon and orange) flavors on their own. The strawberry-banana flavor tastes like how burnt candles smell and looks remarkably similar to the orange. It's a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Dever

customer_reviews.title: The best kid vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using these for years and my daughter loves them. They are an all in one product, so the value is fantastic for the money. So pleased with these! I have tried almost all of them from the supplement store and these are the only ones we stick with.
customer_reviews.author: R. R Scriven

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It has helped my son immensely. I recommend it for kids who have some trouble focusing and digestive issues as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Agudelo

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat pricey decent Candy vitamin
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey and the texture is a little too sticky for me are you liking I bought them for my kid and he likes them. They seem to be fairly complete so there you go Anyone who has a relatively normal diverse diet doesn't need vitamins. Unfortunately my son isn't quite there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mats Hagstrom

customer_reviews.title: If your kids are picky they probably won't eat them.
customer_reviews.text: These are not tasty. At all. After two nights of my son complaining I tasted one. They are gross, but too expensive to toss so he’s eating them anyway but I definitely won’t repurchase. If your kid is picky, don’t waste the money. They are a little harder than gummies, too. More solid. And the smell is off putting.
customer_reviews.author: Yeahno

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to serving size
customer_reviews.text: My son (5) has taken these for 2 months. He loves them. My only complaint is he has to take 4 a day. Maybe consider making a product for older kids?
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Smarty Pants Chewable Vitamins, but with Fiber Too!
customer_reviews.text: My sons doctor added these as part of a diet and lifestyle change. Can’t find these in our local stores with the fiber. They came sooner than expected and were a good price. I will reorder for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: My kids' favorite brand.
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are the ones my kids like the best. To me they taste kind of like Dot candies but less chewy. They take these with probiotics and have no issues going to the bathroom. I have been giving these to them for over a year now with no issues regarding quality or bad taste. Sometimes they get a little stuck together. If you give the bottle a little shake they become unstuck.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Simply put? My daughter hates these.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put? My daughter HATES these. They are hard and the flavor isn’t great (I tried one to see why she was so incredibly opposed to them). I wanted her to love these as I’m a fan of the overall ingredients and nutritional value. But I can’t coax or bribe her with anything to make it happen. Two stars versus one because I like the ingredients but can’t give three because they are a waste of money for us. Back to the drawing board!
customer_reviews.author: lsutigeralumna

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son doesnt like the flavors at all. Hes not a picky eater either so I was truthfully very surprised that he doesnt like these gummies. Back to hunting for a different vitamin that he will like and that can give him all the nutrients he needs to succeed in his academics and mind/body growth.
customer_reviews.author: Laisha

customer_reviews.title: Really! WTF!!...
customer_reviews.text: Really! WTF!!... came without a cap and tiny punchured whole!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Love Smarty pants
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I like the smarty pants vitamins. I knock down one for this specific ones cause it doesnt have the sugar coating my kids like! I will get the orange top multi completes from now on
customer_reviews.author: Nina R.

customer_reviews.title: Love them but sticky!
customer_reviews.text: We love these for our son get all his daily nutrients including fiber! Our son loves the taste and has no problem taking them. We bought a double pack, the first bottle was a little sticky but a couple bangs on the counter would break them up. The second bottle is so sticky that we have to break apart the vitamins with knife or something to poke inside the bottle. We will still buy these, but I hope this quality issue can be addressed, as I know I'm not the only one with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: KRL6

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, great ingredients, love the added fiber!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these! I have a 7 year old and we have used these for the past few years. Great taste, love the added fiber, that has made a difference in my guy being regular. He looks forward to taking these and will ask for them, unlike other kid gummy vitamins we have tired. Oh and I love that they are not coated in sugar!!! Great product, will continue to purchase! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: CindyRo

customer_reviews.title: Great kids multi vitamin
customer_reviews.text: If you compare most of the kids multi vitamins out there, they’re loaded with sugar, possibly coated with it and have some questionable contents. My kids love the taste of these, they provide all the supplements they need and do not have artificial colors. These are a win.
customer_reviews.author: TXJaxon

customer_reviews.title: Got at a good price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t care too UCD for the flavor, but she takes them anyway. Got on a daily deal, so it was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: EMV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've searched very long for a multi vitamin for my kid that contains fiber and omega 3 with no synthetics I like this product because it contains the following: * folate (l-methylfolate) suppose to folic Acid * methylcobalamin (Vit B12 ) suppose to cyanocobalamin * dietary fiber and soluble fiber * omega 3 from fish oil Oh and my kid loves the taste too
customer_reviews.author: JudyA

customer_reviews.title: What the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren's doctor actually said what kind and brand to buy. There are different colored bottles but we always choose the green one because there is a little fiber in them. That's always helpful for kids who eat mac and cheese and cheese and cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Helen from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I bought these. The first time they were sugar coated and my SPD son would not eat them. Then I saw that they weren't sugar coated and he loved them. This 3rd batch is sugar coated again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: They Won!
customer_reviews.text: We just did a "taste test" with a couple of other brands, and this one won out. My son also noticed that these had no added sugars, which is a big deal. If your kid likes "gummies", they'll love these. Especially given that they're vitamins. Sold!
customer_reviews.author: okie dokie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and economical
customer_reviews.text: love these vitamins. Great option for my 4 years old.I like the fact it has D3, multi vitamins, Omegas and fiber in one. This is much more convenient and economical than having to buy vitamins separately, especially for a small child. I researched before my purchase and felt this company offered a good product for my child without all the additives, colors etc. They are about the size of a gumdrop and my 4 year old does not have a issue chewing. I even tried one and the taste is very pleasant. I am even considering purchasing the adult version for my husband. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: My Kiddos love to take their vitamins daily!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 and 9 year old take these and they do not complain and actually look forward to it. Complete mommy win! Taste great and easy to chew. Only complaint maybe that the recommendation on the bottle says that have to take 4 daily. We break them up 2 in the morning and 2 at night. Seems like a lot!
customer_reviews.author: aimee burns

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but overall good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Good everyday vitamins for my kids, they said taste is just okay. A little pricey
customer_reviews.author: Maria Landin

customer_reviews.title: healthy choice for kids
customer_reviews.text: My three kids love the taste of the vitamins ages 5,7, and 8. I am a sugar Nazi. I love that theses do not contain added sugar. I love the type vitamins that are put inside these. Very pleased thank you Smarty Pants.
customer_reviews.author: Julie O

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin
customer_reviews.text: My son ate them with no problem. Impossible to tell if they really do anything though
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. After he started taking these his appetite grew through the roof. We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Brings back the memories
customer_reviews.text: Jack the ripper jr says he loves his vitamins, he loves the flavor soo much. I even agree that they smell delish, reminds me of the time growing up where i would take Flintstone vitamins. Thats what it smells like. 😋
customer_reviews.author: Jack_The_Ripper

customer_reviews.title: Hard, and not our favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I do appreciate the ingredients, but these things are harder than dots candies and stick all over my 4 year old's teeth! Not to mention I can barely get him to eat 2 let alone 4, especially since he refuses to eat lemon flavored ones!
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: These were too harsh on my sons stomach and he wasn’t able to take them without getting an upset stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Jagusch

customer_reviews.title: So thankful I found these. My kid won't take ...
customer_reviews.text: So thankful I found these. My kid won't take pills and I havn't been able to get her to eat gummies because all the brands I found were sugar coated and she hates sugar. These are NOT sugar coated - yay! They are the only vitamin I've actually been able to get her to take without a big fuss.
customer_reviews.author: John 14:6

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Not that good fiber advance tastes better . Very chewy with a vitamin flavor. Kids didn't like them. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamins for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love those gummies. After 2-3 months of using them, no new sinus infections and colds. I subscribed to get them automatically ( saves on cost, also).
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Really help
customer_reviews.text: These have really been helping to keep my son regular. He’s had poop issues for years and these really seem to help.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality just not a good texture
customer_reviews.text: My day hated them...I’m so sad because I bought a two pack and she barley took 4 before she would cry and refuse to eat them. They’re now my gummies and they taste like a gummy version of a Flintstones vitamin. They’re not the best texture and my daughter has sensory issues! Good quality just not for us!
customer_reviews.author: Gabbin4God

customer_reviews.title: We Love These!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 (almost 5) year old loves these. She normally takes the Vitastars every day but I was getting frustrated with the consistency of those and I felt like by the time we got to the bottom of the bottle, many would be broken or starting to crumble. They just didn't seem to stay fresh. Even though she has taken the Vitastars for a couple of years now, she loves the SmartyPants even more than those, and looks forward to her vitamin each morning. I love that they are made in the US and don't have extra junk in them like all the mainstream vitamins out there.
customer_reviews.author: BeachMom

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins but bad flavoring
customer_reviews.text: I actually like Smarty Pants vitamins a lot. I like that it's supposedly free of GMOs, synthetic colors, artificial flavors, etc. So when they had a sale, I stocked up and bought three bottles for my children. Unfortunately, my kids did not like this flavor at all. I had to force them to eat the vitamins and gave away one bottle. We're almost done with the last bottle, but I won't buy this specific type again since if my kids don't like it, it doesn't matter how beneficial it is.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Complete Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about giving these vitamins to my daughter. They are a multivitamin with Omega 3 Fish-oil, fiber, D3, and B12. It is 4 gummies a day but my daughter does not mind, she loves the taste. My daughter can be a picky eater so I feel good giving these to her while I work on expanding her tastebuds. Nonetheless, great vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: SClark

customer_reviews.title: My kids want to take their vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: They are great tasting and my kids love taking their vitamins. My kids actually remind me when I haven't given them their vitamins. I can't believe how much money I'm saving, by buying them through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: crystelle

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes that my son will like this one
customer_reviews.text: I've searched for while and have decided to give this one a try. I had high hopes that my son will like this one, but is a battle to make him have one or two, could never make him have the 4 ones, as indicated. It's been over a month since I bought and now they are so glued together that I have to use a knife to separate them. I tried one because I couldn't believe why my son hated so much and I couldn't stand the aftertaste. It was horrible. Waisted $20 and now I will have to go back with my search for another one. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Silva

customer_reviews.title: Love these vitamins! Taste great! Sticks to the bottle but a good shake takes care of that
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these ages 13 and 7. We previously used little critters but my kids didn't like the taste that much so I tried these they taste great! They do however stick together and get stuck to the bottom of the bottle a good shake and a smack of your hand loosens them definitely not something to keep me from buying them.
customer_reviews.author: GD&JD2016

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! 10 out of 10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old has had major constipation issues for the last 6 months. Waiting 4-5 days to poop each time. He screams and cries every time and I think he may have held it on purpose cause it hurt. He’s been taking these for 3 days and already took 2 big poops with no crying. Anyways great product definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Grace L. Bass

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year olds who like gummy bears
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these after reading so many reviews but they didn't work for us. My 3 year olds who like gummy bears, took them out of their mouth and refused to have them. I tried one and agreed with their rejection. They totally taste like medicine. So, those went in the garbage. Bought Trader Joe's brand gummy vitamins and my sons love them now
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Great gummies!
customer_reviews.text: Great gummies and my daughter really likes them. My daughter was/is having constipation issues, I wouldn't necessarily say they fixed her problems but I'm sure that they have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Channing

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Special need daughter with constipation for years. We have this for 5- months and works wonder. One a day or every other going with no problem. Like is everything in one. I would like maybe more Vit D. But keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: aro

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins they are yummy.
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are really delicious. You have to stop yourself from eating more than you should. And you can take them if you’re an adult. I’ve tried a bunch of different ones from this company smarty pants. And they are all fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ifyoulikepinacoladas

customer_reviews.title: We love these
customer_reviews.text: We love these, helps my son have regular bowels, Taste good, and they came in perfect condition, they were not stuck to each other like when I buy them from the store-Love em
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson won’t eat these because they’re too hard. By all the positive reviews I hoped this would be the answer to his bowel issues. Has anyone else had this problem. Can you cut them up and put them in a muffin or cookie?? Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: 2pann2

customer_reviews.title: Taste awful!
customer_reviews.text: These taste horrible!!! I made my kids take them twice and they acted like they were almost going to be sick so I tried one and it was as bad as they acted. Probably lots of vitamins and minerals but they don’t do any good if you (or the children) can not tolerate the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Little ones loves these. Use them as a treat 😍
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Only draw back is for the daily recommendation the bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Only draw back is for the daily recommendation the bottle doesn’t hold enough. My daughter thinks they are fruit snacks and I have no problem getting her to eat them I’m the morning. They do have a vitamin smell To them
customer_reviews.author: Jess Burston

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves these! He has had problems with constipation due to his diet. He doesn’t eat much and when he does it’s not a well balanced diet because he refuses to eat anything good for him. I decided on these gummies after many good reviews from people that I know. Saying that the ingredients help with behavior also. I honestly think it has helped a ton! I have already ordered more. These have saved our life! They taste like normal fruit snacks and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Great kids vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been taking these for a few months and really like the flavor. In fact, they usually have to remind me to give them to them! I give the kids two after breakfast and two after dinner. My kids have NOT experienced any upset stomach from taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Kai

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of fish
customer_reviews.text: Opened the container and was hit with the smell of fish - VERY unpleasant. Maybe I got a spoiled batch? Tried to return item, and was refused. Disappointing. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Helped regulate my son snd he loves the taste!
customer_reviews.text: My son was constipated and I got these vitamins along with probiotics and it helped regulate him. He loves the taste and looks forward to his vitamins every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen wonderful results of giving these vitamins to my 3 and 5 year olds! My 5 year old suffers constipation and is a picky eater. He is now REGULAR, and I have seen an improvement in his appetite, a welcome improvement!
customer_reviews.author: RFC

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: my 3 year old daughter loves these gummies and her trips to the bathroom are 100 percent more successful after taking them only two weeks.she does have more gas than normal but I am guessing as her body gets used to it it will subside. As far as the complaints about them not being good, just remember that there are people who eat only a few varieties of food and are just picky in general. As for the price, you get what you pay for. For me junk food and pop are way too expensive Quality items like this, you will pay for if you value quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Schrock

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old loves theSe gummies good taste he asks for them!
customer_reviews.author: Chassity holthouser

customer_reviews.title: SmartyPants Kids Fiber
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been taking these vitamins since October 2014. As other parents know, it's so hard to get the right vitamin a child will eat with everything they need. We've tried so many different vitamins; chew-able, gummy, and liquid. It can be quite a complicated frustrating expensive process. These are not the most expensive vitamins I've bought and definitely not the cheapest. I do like that amazon (or the company?) will offer clip and save coupons periodically on this product. Great vitamin, my kids will eat them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gave my kids diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: My kids didn't mind the flavor. I personally thought it was gross. My main complaint is it gave all my kids diarrhea. We won't order this again.
customer_reviews.author: CRhine

customer_reviews.title: Gummy yummy vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, easily digested. My 2 and 4 year old think it's candy. I originally bought it because I thought it was just a fiber gummy. But it's actually a vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Eustace Daniyan

customer_reviews.title: My kids actually like the flavor!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several different vitamins over the years and they just quit being so compliant and eating them if they tasted bad. They ask for these every day! I say that's a win!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The kids get excited to take these everyday. It even motivates my toddlers to eat all of their food so that they can have their vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Rogers

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Home delivery makes this super convenient. My son loves these "candies" --- he says they taste like candy, makes vitamins tolerable for young ones.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fiber helps
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients, my daughter does not like the taste, especially so many but maybe she is different. They added fiber does help her keep a more regular poop schedule.
customer_reviews.author: CB JENNINGS

customer_reviews.title: but I feel great about them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after reading that Omega 3 may help my 7 year old who was struggling with reading. He has been taking 4 vitamins a day for about 5 weeks. I feel that he is more patient and cooperative, a little more focused and his reading is improving. I can't say for sure it's the vitamins, but I feel great about them! i ordered 2 more bottles already, we don't want to run out! Also, they taste FANTASTIC, and are really soft and chewy and fruity. My son loves to take them, it's like a treat for him. I tried one, and it was great, like candy.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good price and quality, and easy to get the child to chew. Great vitamin!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: My 4YO is sort of OK with these, but is a little unsure of some of the flavors. I also tell them they are a treat "just for toddlers" as I don't want him to associate candy with medicine/vitamins... I don't know that we will purchase these again, we will see. I'm just sort of "meh" on whether we like them or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany V

customer_reviews.title: Corrected 6 yr olds digestion issues
customer_reviews.text: Literally corrected my 6 year olds digestion issues in about 2 weeks. He is happily back on on track and very regular. And he loves eating his gummies.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINA V

product_meta.title: SmartyPants Kids Formula & Fiber Daily Gummy Multivitamin: Fiber for Digestive Health, Vitamin C, D3, & Zinc for Immunity, Omega 3 Fish Oil (EPA & DHA), B6, Methyl B12, 120 Count (30 Day Supply)
product_meta.description: SmartyPants Kids Complete and Fiber is a premium, multifunctional supplement that delivers omega-3s from fish oil, prebiotic fiber for digestion and essential nutrients including vitamin D3 for bones, vitamin B12 for energy and folate as methylfolate –all in one delicious gummy.*
feature_bullets: Kids Formula & Fiber with new premium ingredients, all in one delicious serving: Beta Carotene, Vitamin B6, Vitamin K2 & Choline (Packaging May Vary).

Non-GMO. Free of milk, eggs, peanuts, tree nut allergens, fish allergens, shellfish, soy, gluten and wheat. No synthetic colors or artificial sweeteners/flavors. 3RD PARTY LAB TESTED. No refrigeration required.
For children 4 years of age and older, take 2 gummies daily for the first week, 4 gummies daily thereafter. May be taken with or without food. Chew each gummy thoroughly.

15 essential nutrients: omega-3 EPA & DHA (from fish oil), fiber for digestion, vitamin D3 for bone & immune health, vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin) for energy, vitamin E (from sunflower oil) for antioxidant support and iodine for thyroid support.*
Multivitamin gummies for kids with omega-3 EPA & DHA (essential fatty acids) sustainably sourced from wild-caught small fish; contains annatto
